topic.title: Wake on LAN on OSI Layer 2

body.p: This method gives the most consistent results. The agent sends a magic packet directly on layer 2 of OSI (EtherType 0x0842) on the network. Be aware that this method requires the agent sending magic packets to be in the same subnet as the clients to be waked up.
body.note: This is the method used by agents running on Linux distributions (Debian, Fedora, RedHat, Ubuntu ...).
